entry.title: SherlockLinux/SherlockLinux
entry.summary:
Distribuci√≥n para OSINT basada en Debian 12 / OSINT Distribution based in Debian 12

Sherlock Linux

https://www.sherlock-linux.org/

Distribuci√≥n de OSINT basada en Debian 12 y entorno de escritorio XFCE.

  • Gran cantidad de herramientas preinstaladas para la obtenci√≥n de informaci√≥n en fuentes abiertas para investigaciones OSINT.
  • Navegadores preconfigurados con los mejores recursos para investigaciones OSINT.
  • Entorno de escritorio dise√±ado para tener todas las herramientas accesibles por categor√≠as.

Descarga SHERLOCK LINUX.

  • Usuario: sherlock
  • Contrase√±a: sherlock

O ...

INSTALA SHERLOCK LINUX

Este script se ha probado √∫nicamente en una distribuci√≥n Debian 12 con entorno de escritorio XFCE.

1¬∫ Crear el usuario sherlock y a√±adirlo a sudoers:

su -l
apt install sudo
adduser sherlock sudo
echo 'sherlock  ALL=(ALL) NOPASSWD:ALL' >> /etc/sudoers
su sherlock

2¬∫ Instalar Git y Clonar el repositorio:

sudo apt install git
git clone https://github.com/SherlockLinux/SherlockLinux.git ~/SherlockLinux

3¬∫ Dar permisos de ejecuci√≥n al script de Sherlock Linux

sudo chmod +x ~/SherlockLinux/SherlockLinux.sh

4¬∫ Ejecutar el script

cd ~/SherlockLinux/
./SherlockLinux.sh

Comienza la instalaci√≥n...

HERRAMIENTAS INSTALADAS

  • Bbot
  • Certgraph
  • Cloud Fail
  • Cloud Scraper
  • DNS Recon
  • EO Ripper
  • ExifTool
  • EyeWitness

  • Hostintel
  • HTTrack
  • Infoga
  • Instaloader
  • Maltego
  • Metagoofil
  • OSRFramework
  • Alias_generator
  • Checkfy
  • Domainfy
  • Mailfy
  • Phonefy
  • Searchfy
  • Usufy
  • Pagodo
  • Phone infoga
  • Photon
  • Protosint
  • Scanless
  • Sherlock
  • Spiderfoot CLI
  • Spiderfoot GUI
  • TheHarvester
  • WhatWeb
  • XRay
  • Yacy
  • ...

Puedes ver aqu√≠ la lista completa de herramientas.

ESCRITORIO

V√≠deo de presentaci√≥n

CONTACTO

DISCLAIMER

  • EL SCRIPT DE INSTALACI√ìN REALIZA CAMBIOS A NIVEL DE SO QUE PUEDEN DA√ëAR EL SISTEMA OPERATIVO, EJECUTA EL SCRIPT EN UN ENTORNO CONTROLADO Y BAJO TU PROPIO RIESGO.
  • ESTE SOFTWARE SE DISTRIBUYE GRATUITAMENTE BAJO LICENCIA GPL-3 Y NO GARANTIZA SU FUNCIONAMIENTO EN DIFERENTES VERSIONES DE LINUX.

entry.title: JaKooLit/Hyprland-Dots
entry.summary:
Hyprland dots, used as main repo for all my Hyprland Install Scripts.

üíå ** JaKooLit Hyprland Dot Files ** üíå


Some preview

https://github.com/JaKooLit/Hyprland-Dots/assets/85185940/4c98fa74-0190-4a1d-96d6-2df304ed1aa2

üëÅÔ∏è‚Äçüó®Ô∏è My Hyprland install Scripts üëÅÔ∏è‚Äçüó®Ô∏è

  • You can install Hyprland using Scripts below:

  • Fedora-Linux

  • Debian/Ubuntu-Linux

  • Arch-Linux

  • OpenSUSE(Tumbleweed)

  • refer to install scripts what packages needed to install... but atleast, Hyprland packages is needed üòèüòèüòè duh!!

üëÄ Screenshots üëÄ

  • All screenshots are collected here Screenshots

üì¶ Whats new?

  • To easily track changes, I will be updating the changelogs. CHANGELOGS Screenshots will be included if worth it!

üìπ A video walkthroughs

  • Walkthough

  • V1-Changes

  • v2-Changes

üìΩÔ∏è A video coverage by other users. Pls watch and subscribe to their channel

  • Link

‚ú® Copying instructions.

  • Note! The auto copy script will create backups of intended folders to be copied. However, still a good idea to manually backup just incase script failed to backup!

  • ~/.config (btop cava dunst hypr kitty rofi swappy swaylock waybar wlogout) - These are folders to be copied.

  • ~/Pictures/wallpapers - Will be backed up

üîî Automatic copy of configurations

clone this repo by using git. Change directory, make executable and run the script

git clone https://github.com/JaKooLit/Hyprland-Dots.git
cd Hyprland-Dots

to copy from upstream (possible bugs)

chmod +x copy.sh
./copy.sh

to copy from releases (more "stable")

chmod +x release.sh
./release.sh
  • More info HERE

üõéÔ∏è a small note on wallpapers

  • by default, only few wallpapers will be copied (1 each dark and light plus 2 more). You will be offered to download more wallpapers. You can preview/check the additional wallpapers on THIS Link

‚ö†Ô∏è‚ö†Ô∏è‚ö†Ô∏è A MUST! after copying these dots

  • By default I have not set a wallpaper. Press SUPER W and set a wallpaper. This is also to initiate pywal for waybar, kitty (tty) and rofi themes. If you use the copy.sh script, you wont need to do this.

  • Nvidia Owners. Make sure to edit your ~/.config/hypr/configs/ENVariables.conf if you have set a proper environment already. (recommended). WLR_NO_CURSORS will be activated if nvidia gpu is detected.

  • If you have already set your own keybinds, monitors, etc.... Just copy over from backup created before log-out or reboot. (recommended)

üìñ Known issues and possible solutions

  • check out this page FAQ and UNSOLVED ISSUES

üôã QUESTIONS ?!?! ‚ÅâÔ∏è

  • FAQ! Yes you can use these dotfiles to other distro! Just ensure to install proper packages first! If it makes you feel better, I use same config on my Gentoo and NixOS :)
  • QUICK HINT! Click the HINT! Waybar module (note only available in Waybar default and Simple-L [TOP] layout). Can be launched by Keybind SUPER H
  • More question? click here WIKI

üôè Special request

  • If you have improvements on the dotfiles or configuration, feel free to submit a PR for improvement. I always welcome improvements as I am also just learning just like you guys!
  • Waybar styles (all those new panel styles require some tweaking) - I kindly request assistance üôè

ü§∑‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è TO DO!

  • Tweak waybar layouts and Themes
  • Tweak rofi layouts and Themes
  • [ ] Quite possibly switch to starship? Although starship has limited themes compared to oh-my-zsh. no plans for now

üîÆ Discord Server

  • kindly join my Discord

üíñ Support

  • a Star on my Github repos would be nice üåü

  • Subscribe to my Youtube Channel YouTube

  • You can also buy me Coffee Through ko-fi.com ü§©
